componentDescription: An unstyled radio menu item to be used within a Menu.

closeOnClick.description: If true, the menu will close when the menu item is clicked.

disabled.description: If true, the menu item will be disabled.

id.description: The id of the menu item.

label.description: A text representation of the menu item's content. Used for keyboard text navigation matching.

onClick.description: The click handler for the menu item.

value.description: Value of the radio item. This is the value that will be set in the MenuRadioGroup when the item is selected.
